Struct TouchEvent

A touch event that can be dispatched with StandaloneWebView.DispatchTouchEvent().

Syntax
public struct TouchEvent

Fields

Point

The normalized point of the touch event.

Declaration
public Vector2 Point
Field Value
Type Description
UnityEngine.Vector2
Remarks

The x and y components of the point are values in the range of [0, 1] that are normalized to the webview's width and height. For example, point.x = xInPixels / webView.SizeInPixels.x. Like in the browser, the origin is in the upper-left corner, the positive direction of the y-axis is down, and the positive direction of the x-axis is right.

RadiusX

(optional) The X radius of the touch in pixels. If not set, the default value of 25px will be used.

RadiusY

(optional) The Y radius of the touch in pixels. If not set, the default value of 25px will be used.

RotationAngle

(optional) The rotation angle in radians.

Declaration
public float RotationAngle
Field Value
Type Description
System.Single

TouchID

ID of the touch. This value must be unique per touch but is shared by all events for the same touch (i.e. the Start, Move, and End events for a single touch share the same TouchID). This can be any number except -1, and a maximum of 16 concurrent touches are tracked.

Declaration
public int TouchID
Field Value
Type Description
System.Int32

Type

The touch event type. Touches begin with one TouchEventType.Start event, followed by zero or more TouchEventType.Move events, and finally one TouchEventType.End or TouchEventType.Cancel event.

Declaration
public TouchEventType Type
Field Value
Type Description
TouchEventType
